title: Buff Garen
body: Post your best ideas on how to buff garen in this thread.

replies.body:
Garen can choose who to tag as the Villain and can tag the whole enemy team as the game progresses.
His Q now also increases his basic attack to 600 range and will blink Garen to the target enemy on strike (doesn't pull creep aggro anymore).
His W becomes Poppy old R but still grants % damage reduction.
His E now does all of it's damage and spins over 0.5 seconds instead of 4. 
His Ult can be cast while CC'd, it ignores immunity effects and revives passives, refunds CD 
on takedown while granting double gold on kill to his team, enemies killed by it also have their death timer increased by 50%.
I think he's in a decent spot as it is.
He's borderline overpowered right now, and I say that as a Garen player.

He's probably going to get nerfs soon and deservedly so. 

Across most of the elos, he's got a win rate of 54% or better. And this is despite the fact that he's one of the most picked top lane champs if not the highest pick.

Even in diamond where he's supposed to drop off sharply because of a low skill cap and predicable play style, he's sitting at 53.8% WR. If that doesn't scream OP, I don't know what does.
If his passive is active, and you break it, he immediately Olaf ults.

Global range on ultimate that now deals AOE damage and resets on kill.

Oh, and his W gives him true stealth now.

Ideas:

P: Instead of healing, have it apply Darius bleed to Garen every second, if Garen dies from this affect it rewards entire enemy team with double kill gold.

Q: remove the damage and add an annointing affect to enemies who are hit. Annointed enemies deal 1.5x dmg to Allies of Garen.

W: stays the same, but instead of giving Garen the buff it gives the buff to the entire enemy team

E: heal enemies that are within the spin instead of damaging them

R: Forces both teams to instantly tp to Baron Pitt and every character is suppressed for 1 minute and immune to damage while using the dance emote.

Seems balanced to me{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
